quest.name: So You Want to Be a Lancer

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Lancers' Guild, adventurer.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: If you seek to refine your skills with the polearm, then you have come to the right place.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: Here at the Lancers' Guild, spear wielders gather to train with one another, and further hone their abilities under the tutelage of our fine instructors. Do you seek membership with us?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Do you wish to join the Lancers' Guild?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: I see. It would seem you are already occupied with other pursuits.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: In which case, you have no further business here. Please be on your way.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: While your enthusiasm is commendable, you are yet a stripling among adventurers.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: You must gain more experience before you can be considered for a place within these halls. Return here again once you have done so.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Before you can take up another discipline, you must first complete the level 10 quest of your starting class.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: Very well. I shall provide you with an insight into the history of our guild.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: More than just an instrument of war, the spear is also a tool for hunting, and with game ever plentiful in the Twelveswood, the weapon has been the mainstay of the locals here since before the founding of Gridania.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: With the passing of time, our nation became a gathering place for spearmasters from across the realmâ”€many eager to test their mettle against the famed might of our Wood Wailers.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: And it was here in Gridania that their myriad fighting styles came into contact, eventually giving rise to the art taught here today.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: That spear technique could be formalized at all owed much to the founding of the Lancers' Guild by Wood Wailer captain Mistalle nigh on a century past.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: The tradition of accepting students from without as well as within Gridania's borders persists to this day, ensuring that the art of the polearm may not only survive, but also continue to evolve.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: Well, there you have it. I hope this brief history of the guild has helped settle any doubts in your mind.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: The Lancers' Guild is always eager to welcome new initiates.

dialogue.name: JILLIAN
dialogue.text: If you've a will to enlist, speak with me again and we can begin the enrollment procedures.
